headline: S.P.E.A.R.™ Protocol: Dual AI Validation by Grok and ChatGPT for 100M Users
description: The S.P.E.A.R.™ Protocol receives unprecedented dual AI validation from both Grok (xAI) and ChatGPT (OpenAI) for 100M user rollout and $7.9B valuation model.

about.name: S.P.E.A.R.™ Protocol
about.description: Sponsored Protocol for Engagement, Acquisition & Retargeting - AI-powered checkout protocol that converts messaging into instant, frictionless commerce

offers.description: Enterprise valuation confirmed by dual AI validation

award.name: Grok (xAI) Validation

award.name: ChatGPT (OpenAI) Validation
